results.name: The School (reaperaru, Reiyx, yeenxdd, Yong Gee Enn, potanim)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
